INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, UNIT_NAME, DELIVERY_PRICE, PRODUCT_TYPE, FK_STORE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productContent}, #{productQuantity}, #{unitName}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{productType}, #{storeNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO productNO, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, p.DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(p.PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.IMG_LEVEL FROM TB_PRODUCT p JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON p.PRODUCT_NO = i.IMG_POST_NO WHERE p.STATUS = 'Y' AND i.IMG_LEVEL = 1 AND i.CATEGORY_NO = p.FK_MAIN_NO ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_DATE DESC

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO productNO, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, p.DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(p.PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.IMG_LEVEL FROM TB_PRODUCT p JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON p.PRODUCT_NO = i.IMG_POST_NO WHERE p.STATUS = 'Y' AND i.IMG_LEVEL = 1 AND i.CATEGORY_NO = p.FK_MAIN_NO AND p.FK_STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_DATE DESC

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO productNo, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, p.PRODUCT_QUANTITY productQuantity, p.UNIT_NAME unitName, p.DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(p.PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT productContent, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.IMG_LEVEL FROM TB_PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON p.PRODUCT_NO = i.IMG_POST_NO WHERE p.STATUS = 'Y' AND i.CATEGORY_NO = p.FK_MAIN_NO AND p.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO productNo, p.PRODUCT_NAME productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice, p.PRODUCT_QUANTITY productQuantity, p.UNIT_NAME unitName, p.DELIVERY_PRICE deliveryPrice, TO_CHAR(p.PRODUCT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as productDate, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT productContent, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.IMG_LEVEL FROM TB_PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON p.PRODUCT_NO = i.IMG_POST_NO WHERE p.STATUS = 'Y' AND i.CATEGORY_NO = p.FK_MAIN_NO AND p.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MY_STORE ( STORE_NO, STORE_TITLE, STORE_CONTENT, FK_MAIN_NO, FK_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_STORE.NEXTVAL, #{storeTitle}, #{storeContent}, 5, #{userNo} )

INSERT INTO TB_IMAGE ( IMG_NO, ORIGIN_IMG_NAME, CHANGE_IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH, IMG_LEVEL, IMG_POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL, #{originImgName}, #{changeImgName}, #{imgPath}, #{imgLevel}, SEQ_STORE.CURRVAL, 5 )
mapper.select: SELECT STORE_NO storeNo FROM TB_MY_STORE WHERE FK_MEMBER_NO = #{userNo} AND STORE_NO IS NOT NULL

SELECT m.STORE_NO storeNo, m.STORE_TITLE storeTitle, m.STORE_CONTENT storeContent, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.IMG_PATH, m.FK_MEMBER_NO userNo FROM TB_MY_STORE m JOIN TB_MAIN_CATEGORY c ON (m.FK_MAIN_NO = c.MAIN_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON (i.IMG_POST_NO = m.STORE_NO) WHERE i.IMG_STATUS = 'Y' AND m.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}

SELECT m.STORE_NO storeNo, m.STORE_TITLE storeTitle, m.STORE_CONTENT storeContent, i.CHANGE_IMG_NAME changeImgName, i.ORIGIN_IMG_NAME originImgName, i.IMG_PATH imgPath, m.FK_MEMBER_NO userNo, i.IMG_NO imgNo FROM TB_MY_STORE m JOIN TB_MAIN_CATEGORY c ON (m.FK_MAIN_NO = c.MAIN_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_IMAGE i ON (i.IMG_POST_NO = m.STORE_NO) WHERE i.IMG_STATUS = 'Y' AND m.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MY_STORE SET STORE_TITLE = #{storeTitle}, STORE_CONTENT = #{storeContent} WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
UPDATE TB_IMAGE SET ORIGIN_IMG_NAME = #{originImgName}, CHANGE_IMG_NAME = #{changeImgName}, IMG_PATH = #{imgPath} WHERE IMG_NO = #{imgNo}
